org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.mission

Class MissionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.drone.DroneVariable<GenericMavLinkDrone>
      • org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.mission.MissionImpl

  • public class MissionImpl
extends DroneVariable<GenericMavLinkDrone>
    This implements a mavlink mission. A mavlink mission is a set of commands/mission items to be carried out by the drone.
